document.docAuthor: Li, Yang, He, Jun-Hua & Chen, Xue-Xin
document.masterDocTitle: Review of six genera of Braconinae Nees (Hymenoptera, Braconidae) in China, with the description of eleven new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Review of six genera of Braconinae Nees (Hymenoptera, Braconidae) in China, with the description of eleven new species

figureCitation.captionText-1: FIGURE 40. Stenobracon (Stenobracon) deesae (Cameron, 1902). ♀. a. fore wing; b. hind wing; c. mesosoma, lateral view; d. mesosoma, dorsal view; e. metasoma, dorsal view; f. hind leg, lateral view; g. head, front view; h. head, dorsal view; i. head, lateral view; j. first metasomal tergite, dorsal view; k. sacpus outer side, lateral view; l. apex of ovipositor, lateral view.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material.
1♀ , China , Zhejiang Prov. , Qingyuan ,
20–31.VIII.1981
, Zhu Kunyan, No. 815487 ( ZJUH )
;
1♂ , China , Zhejiang Prov. , Qingyuan ,
3.VIII.1987
, Wu Quancong, No. 851999 ( ZJUH )
;
1♀ , China , Zhejiang Prov. , Hangzhou ,
5. VI
.1935, Chu Ruzuo ( ZJUH );
1♀ , China , Jiangsu Prov. , Changxing ,
23. V
.1935, Chu Ruzuo ( ZJUH );
1♀ , China , Jiangsu Prov. , Yixing ,
23. VI
.1935, Chu Ruzuo ( ZJUH );
1♀ , China , Jiangsu Prov. , Nanjing ,?.?.1984, collector un- known, No. 871116 ( ZJUH )
;
1♂ , China , Hunan Prov. , Bucheng Nanshanmufang ,
6.VIII.1985
, Chen Naizhong, No. 200012109 ( ZJUH )
;
1♂ , China , Fujiang Prov. , Shaxian ,
20–30.XI.1980
, He Junhua, No. 803785 ( ZJUH )
.

Biology. The hosts are most species of Pyralidae ( Lepidoptera ), including:
Bissetia steniella (Hampson, 1899)
,
Chilo auricilius (Dudgeon, 1905)
,
Chilo indicus (Kapur)
,
Chilo infuscatellus Snellen, 1890
,
Chilo partellus (Swinhoe, 1885)
,
Chilo suppressalis (Walker, 1863)
,
Chilo tumidicostalis (Hampson)
,
Chilo zonellus (Swinhoe, 1884)
,
Emmalocera depressella (Swinhoe)
,
Raphimetopus ablutella (Zeller, 1839)
,
Schoenobius bipunctifer (Walker)
,
Scirpophaga excerptalis (Walker, 1863)
,
Scirpophaga nivella (Fabricius, 1794)
and
Sesamia inferens (Walker, 1856)
; and one species of Brachodidae ( Lepidoptera ):
Procerata venosata (Walker, 1863)
( Cherian et Subramaniam 1942 ; Trehan et Butani 1950 ; Saxena 1972 ; Nagarkatti et Nair 1973 ;
Gupta et al . 1994
; Chishti et Quicke 1996 ;
Yu et al . 2016
).
Distribution. China (* Fujian , * Hunan , Jiangsu , Zhejiang ); Bangladesh , India , Madagascar , Malaysia , Mauritius , Pakistan , Sudan .
Note. Chu (1937) first reported this species from Jiangsu and Zhejiang (SE. China ).
